main

Class Pill

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Figure
      • main.Pill
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FruitPill, NormalPill, PowerPill

    public abstract class Pill
extends Figure
    Abstract class Pill.
    Pill makes it possible to create pills on the maze. Each pills is placed on a tiles belonging to the maze.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Benoît Martel, Yoann Le Dréan
    See Also:
    PowerPill, NormalPill, FruitPill

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Tile tile
      The tile on which the pill is placed.

    • Field Detail

      • tile

        protected Tile tile
        The tile on which the pill is placed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pill

        Pill(Tile tile,
     java.awt.Color color,
     int factor)
        Constructor of the Pill class.
        The class being abstract it is not possible to create a "Pill" object, it's necessary to go through the sub objects "NormalPill, FruitPill, PowerPill".
        This constructor is called from the subclasses. It allows to select on which tile is the pill, the color of the pill and its size factor on the maze.
        Parameters:
        tile - the tile on which is the Pill.
        color - the color of the Pill.
        factor - the size factor of the Pill.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Method that draws the Pill on the game frame.
        Specified by:
        draw in class Figure

      • removeTile

        void removeTile()
        A method that removes the link from the pill to a tile. This method is used especially when the pill is eaten.

      • getTile

        public Tile getTile()
        Getter tiles. This method retrieves the tile on which the pill is located.
        Returns:
        the tile on which the pill is located.
